thread.title: Katie Holmes Catches The Train At Penn Station In A Ballgown
thread.title_full: Katie Holmes Catches The Train At Penn Station In A Ballgown

author: Cavan Sieczkowski
title: Katie Holmes Catches The Train At Penn Station In A Ballgown
text:
Katie Holmes Catches The Train At Penn Station In A Ballgown Casual. Cavan Sieczkowski Senior Editor, News & Analytics, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/09/2015 03:21 PM EDT 
Katie Holmes sure knows how to travel in style. 
The actress headed to New York's Penn Station Thursday and took a photo on the platform outside a NJ Transit train while dressed in an elaborate gown. "Heels and a train...nothing better #newyork #pennstation," she wrote. 
A photo posted by Katie Holmes (@katieholmes212) on Oct 7, 2015 at 9:31pm PDT 
Holmes was not taking a trip to the Garden State, however. It was all part of a photo shoot. 
"She was at a shoot for a magazine and thought it would be interesting to do a shot in a train ... so she went down to Penn Station to take some pictures in her gown on the NJ Transit," a source told Entertainment Weekly. "It was all rogue -- her idea."
